body_text: It's caught when running filter expressions, and not when fetching actions. Thinking more, I think I want this to log a warning and skip instead of throwing. This PR adds graceful handling of missing actions, which is where this wouldn't catch previously, and I think running other actions if only one of them is malformed from the server is better.
